name: FT ADVENTURE
description:
FT Adventures is a game about a robot who goes through various different types of platforms and environment levels and tries to complete those levels.

in This Game:
- You will face various difficult levels with unique and fun mechanics
  • Many different types of enemies
  • Beautiful sceneries like sea, mountains and mansions
  • Interactive areas with puzzling tricks to solve them
  • Grab your hard as you will approach towards the scary parts of the game

[/list]

And Much Much More

Its levels are very addicting and are a challenge to complete

Do you got what it takes to complete it?
